scenario_text.value: Oh, uh... So this is the waterway, huh?
It’s more of a pathway than I’d imagined.
Unnngh...
How big is it down here?

More like how long. Can’t barely see in front
of us, here.

Could be a pretty big space down there, but
look at this...
Yeah. The fog is pretty thick...
Something’s different about this fog, Takuma!

Different? Like some kinda gas or something?!
Like the breathe-it-and-you’re-dead kind?!

Relax. We’ve already inhaled tons of the
stuff already.

I think you’re right. Still, it seems
dangerous...

It’s hard to see ahead... We had better make
sure we don’t get separated.
Getting lost in here’d be no joke!
Hmm?! Something’s here!
Welcome, children.
Yeeep! Archnemon?!
Kew! Kew!

Yeah, yeah I know, Kunemon... I’m scared too,
but I ain’t runnin’!

For you to come here... Are you so eager to
meet a grim fate?
Please! More like meet your grim FACE!

Just wait until you see the ghastly looks on
your friends’ faces when I’m done with you!

That’s all I need to hear! Let’s do this,
Dracumon!
Yeah!

My, so scary... You may be small, but you
have me outnumbered.
Then again, what do you think about this?

Stay together, guys! It’s too dangerous to
get separated here!

But the fog’s so thick, Takuma... I can’t
tell where anyone is!
We’ll have to try calling out to them!

Ugh... My head... It’s...? The room is
spinning...

(Oh no... The gas is so thick, I don’t know
where the others are. Agumon... Where...?)
Agu...mo...

(Damn, I can’t...even speak... Can’t hear...
his voice...)

(This is all going according to their
plans... I have to do something!)
(Oh no... I’m passing out...)
